'''''Big Ice-Cold Crisis!''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in [[Windwail Highland]], [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A group of Cryo Slimes appeared in the wilderness. Defeat them to put an end to this threat. Electro attacks might work wonders against them.}}
# Defeat all enemies (0/6) {{Enemy List|Cryo Slime*5;Large Cryo Slime}}
